glosses: to choose or prefer one out of a bunch

examples.translation: I liked that shoe the most.
He didn't approve of my idea of dropping out.

etymology:
Etymology tree
Proto-Turkic *bēg
Proto-Turkic *-en-
Proto-Turkic *bẹken-
Ottoman Turkish بگنمك (beğenmek)
Turkish beğenmek
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish بگنمك (beğenmek), from Proto-Turkic *bẹken-, from *bēg (“lord”) + *-en-.
